byline.contributor: Michael Schwirtz and John Surico contributed reporting.
byline.original: By ASHLEY SOUTHALL and J. DAVID GOODMAN

abstract: Retired New York City corrections officer shoots and kills one of two young men he had been arguing with in Brooklyn's Borough Hall subway station; altercation takes place during evening rush hour and trains are briefly diverted.
lead_paragraph: The Metropolitan Transportation Authority said the shooting occurred on the mezzanine level of the Borough Hall station during the evening rush.

headline.main: Man Killed in Brooklyn Subway Station by Ex-Correction Officer, Authorities Say
headline.print_headline: Retired Correction Officer Kills Man in Subway Confrontation, Police Say

snippet: The Metropolitan Transportation Authority said the shooting occurred on the mezzanine level of the Borough Hall station during the evening rush.
